name: Snowy Platformer
description:
Snowy Platformer
  • Explore a snowy world as a young girl. 
  • Jump onto moving platforms and use checkpoints to reach the end of each level. 
  • Battle your friends to see who can make it to the end using the least amount of lives!

New Levels will be added!

Level Select

(all graphics, code and music is my own)                                     

Play in fullscreen mode for the best experience
